room_title: Escape room "Classroom Lockdown" by The Excape Adventure in Modesto
room_address: 1019 E. March Lane Suite C Stockton, CA 95210
room_description:
You and a group of strangers came to John Adam's Elementary School for a group interview. As you entered the interview room, you saw a suspicious man leave and lock the door behind you.
You are now being held hostage by this suspect, who was once a popular janitor of the elementary school and is now taking revenge after being laid off. The janitor has taken your belongings, leaving you with nothing to contact anyone.
â€‹
The bomb is ticking and you can't call for help. Before the suspect left, he told you that there is a hidden switch in the room to turn off the bomb. You have one hour to escape. Can you do it?
